data.title: Matching tool to assist with finding presets for specific bands and songs
data.meta_description:
Has anyone compiled a list that makes it easier to find factory presets for specific bands and or songs? 
For example, I’d love to search for “Rolling Stones” and be presented with a list of presets that would give the R…
data.text:
Has anyone compiled a list that makes it easier to find factory presets for specific bands and or songs?

For example, I’d love to search for “Rolling Stones” and be presented with a list of presets that would give the Rolling Stones sound either in general or for specific songs.

I’m thinking something similar to the BeatBuddy Song Matching Tool or even a google spreadsheet.

Thanks!

Yes. Wouldn’t it be great to have a series of presets, for example’ 78 Brown, High Voltage, Gibbons Eliminator… etc

Could be reviewed by users, and discussions on how to improve each preset.

This would open up the QC and help to demystify its advanced features.

Could be integrated with the Cloud!

Especially for geezers who bought the unit to replace an amp and are not au fait with tech!

Make this a feature request. I’ll vote
